etymology.value: Derived from Middle English 'shereman', meaning 'shearer of cloth', an occupational surname for a person who sheared the nap from woolen cloth.

usage_notes.explanation: Sharman is a surname of English origin. It is also occasionally used as a given name, but is more common as a surname.

readability_explanation.text: Sharman is a name. It can be a last name (surname) or a first name (given name).
